A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So many reviews here say that it is either brilliant or it sucks. I think its just good. Admittedly not the greatest star wars movie. Nevertheless it was something fresh and different\, with no death stars. It really felt that after a long time Star Wars was going in a new direction that I liked\, such a shame it was undermined by The Rise of Skywalker. It could have been a four and a half but the racing and casino sequence was boring and unneeded.
